subtitle: A detailed look at my professional journey and the roles that shaped my expertise in operations, customer success, and team leadership.

jobs.title: Co-Founder & COO
jobs.description: Co-founded Mira, a logistics startup that was later acquired by Chowdeck. As COO, I was responsible for People, Finance, and Customer Operations, building the backbone of the business from the ground up.

achievements.item: Built operational infrastructure from scratch that scaled to serve thousands of customers
Established finance, HR, and customer operations teams and processes
Successfully navigated company acquisition by Chowdeck
Created scalable operational frameworks that were retained post-acquisition

jobs.title: Disputes Operations Lead
jobs.description: Led the dispute resolution team responsible for chargeback, fraud, and merchant engagement operations. Created team structures that improved efficiency and drove significant loss reduction.

achievements.item: Reduced losses due to chargebacks and fraud by 88%
Built and led a high-performing dispute resolution team
Defined processes for debits reconciliation with payment partners
Created team structure that improved efficiency and growth

jobs.title: Product Specialist (Account Management)
jobs.description: Pioneer member of the Key accounts team at Paystack. Worked to define and identify key merchants and the appropriate level of engagement for different merchant categories.

achievements.item: Pioneered the Key Accounts team at Paystack
Defined merchant categorization and engagement strategies
Built and maintained relationships with top key merchants
Established frameworks for key account management

jobs.title: Customer Success Expert
jobs.description: First customer success team member at Paystack when the company was just starting. Tasked with turning Paystack's first clients into advocates and creating educational content.

achievements.item: First customer success hire at Paystack
Turned early clients into product advocates
Created video content for user onboarding
Wrote comprehensive helpdesk articles explaining product features
